subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: After a disastrous outing at the Olympic Winter Games in Turin, Italy, the United States ski team officials introduced new guidelines, including a revised alcohol policy and a requirement that athletes use official team housing during races.
snippet: After a disastrous outing at the Olympic Winter Games in Turin, Italy, the United States ski team officials introduced new guidelines, including a revised alcohol policy and a requirement that athletes use official team housing during races.
